name: Number Bowling
overview: An educational game teaching math using bowling as the exciting background to keep interest levels up. Education/Math Skills-Ages 11 and Up. Written by leaders in educational publishing. Number Bowling helps children master the basics of fraction and decimal skills. In the motivating context of bowling competition, children must solve decimal and fraction problems as the clock counts down. Answering a problem correctly in two seconds or less means a strike, so there's no time to spare! Children experience the pride of success while mastering some of the skills necessary for high school math. Children will: •Understand the relationship between fractions and decimals • Learn to calculate quickly and accurately • Improve problem solving skills • Willingly spend hours on math practice Features •Formats for one or two players • Built-in clock that promotes quick thinking • Interesting graphics • Easy to use game design
